description: Whether agents with this routing profile will have their routing order calculated based on time since their last inbound contact or longest idle time.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The identifier of the Amazon Connect instance. You can find the instance ID in the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the instance.

parameters.name: RoutingProfileId
parameters.description: The identifier of the routing profile.

parameters.name: AgentAvailabilityTimer
parameters.description: Whether agents with this routing profile will have their routing order calculated based on time since their last inbound contact or longest idle time.
